cause.description:
Hare Krishna Hare Krishna Krishna Krishna Hare Hare Hare Rama Hare Rama Rama Rama Hare Hare!
Chant this mantra, and be happy : )
If you wish to know more and/or have any questions, please get in contact with any of the creators of this group. We will be more than happy to help.
1. Lord Krishna- The Supreme Personality of God
2. Mantra- To purify oneself and to have krishna always on the mind
3. Devotes- People who live their life with Krsna in the center of all activities.
cause.mission: Obtain true happiness by simple living and chanting Hare Krishna
cause.name: Hare Krishna
